home.title: Recharge Retreat
home.subtitle: Private Autonomous Shelter. No Neighbors. 9 Hectares of Green Dunes and the Ocean.
home.description: This is not a hotel. Not a cabin. It's a self-sufficient shelter, hidden among dunes, on a private 9-hectare property near the sea.

zone.title: The Zone
zone.description: Located in an area of expensive properties — with gated communities, boutique hotels and seven-figure homes.

ecosystem.title: A Unique Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: These native species are the only ones that manage to survive in the dunes, creating a landscape of austere and resilient beauty that changes with the seasons and daylight.

shelter.title: The Shelter
shelter.description: When everything collapses, you've got a spot in Argentina. Tour it, test it, check the airstrip for your jet. Want your own nearby? Let's talk.
shelter.collapse: A dry run for when it all collapses
shelter.collapseDescription: But you are alone, surrounded by pristine dunes, with no neighbors, no traffic, nothing. A complete disconnection experience, like a rehearsal for when everything collapses.

mainProperty.title: Main Property
mainProperty.description: 9 private hectares of green dunes, covered by only three native species that manage to survive there — and which are surprisingly beautiful

protectedReserve.title: Protected Reserve
protectedReserve.description: Located steps away from the Faro Querandí Ecological Reserve, a protected area of high natural value

totalIsolation.title: Total Isolation
totalIsolation.description: Surrounded by other undeveloped farms: no neighbors, no buildings, no people as far as you can see

ownReserve.title: Your Own Reserve
ownReserve.description: A 1,200-meter perimeter path between high dunes and panoramic views, so you can trek as if walking through your own reserve

whatIf.title: What If You Can't Handle It?

alternative.title: Alternative
alternative.description: We give you a discount to move to Il Buco, our Italian villa with green terrace and 500 Mbps WiFi

booking.title: Ready to Recharge?
booking.description: Book your shelter in the dunes and disconnect from everything that drains you.

location.title: Our Location
location.subtitle: Find us in the heart of the dunes, where the ocean meets the sky.

whereAreYou.title: Where Are You?
whereAreYou.coast: On the Argentine Atlantic coast, close to the Faro Querandí Reserve
whereAreYou.distance: 10 km from Mar de las Pampas, if you regret the isolation

howToGet.title: How to Get Here
howToGet.step2: If the keeper asks for money, say you're going to Ivan
howToGet.step3: Follow the dirt road for about 1.5 km, first turn left. In 300 m you'll see our water tower. Welcome!
howToGet.warning: ⚠️ Warning: Google Maps may suggest the "Salvaje" gated community — that route is blocked
howToGet.gpsNote: Use these coordinates if your GPS doesn't recognize the address
howToGet.note1: The last part of the road is unpaved but accessible by standard vehicles
howToGet.note2: We recommend arriving during daylight hours for your first visit
howToGet.note3: Detailed arrival instructions will be provided after booking

whereNotToGo.title: Where Not to Go
whereNotToGo.description: Google Maps sends you the wrong route (I've reported it, but still). Use this map to turn from the ruta 11.

activities.title: What You'll Do
activities.subtitle: Turn the absence of entertainment into a feature. Reconnect with yourself and nature.

quiet.title: Quiet Activities
quiet.read: Read that book you've been putting off
quiet.stargaze: Stargaze in one of the darkest skies in the region
quiet.coffee: Enjoy your morning coffee in complete silence

active.title: Active Pursuits
active.hike: Hike the 1,200-meter private trail through the dunes
active.beach: Walk to the completely empty beach (3km)
active.wildlife: Observe local wildlife and native plants
active.yoga: Practice yoga or exercise in nature
active.cook: Cook over an open fire under the stars
active.fish: Fish on the steep coast — you can catch sharks

fishing.title: Shark Fishing Experience
fishing.description: Experience the thrill of fishing on our steep coastal waters where sharks roam.

cantHandle.title: What If You Can't Handle It?

connectivity.description: There is cell phone signal for emergencies

proximity.description: There is a town just 5 km away

alternative.description: We offer a discount to move to Il Buco, our Italian villa with a green terrace and 500 Mbps WiFi

land.title: The Land
land.subtitle: 9 hectares of pristine dunes and natural beauty, all to yourself.

privateProperty.title: Private Property
privateProperty.description: 9 hectares of green dunes, covered by only three native species that manage to survive here — and are surprisingly beautiful.

protectedReserve.title: Protected Reserve
protectedReserve.description: Located steps away from the Faro Querandí Ecological Reserve, a protected area of high natural value.

privateTrail.title: Private Trail
privateTrail.description: A 1,200-meter perimeter path between high dunes with panoramic views, for trekking as if you were walking in your own private reserve.

artificialLake.title: Artificial Lake
artificialLake.description: A small artificial lake where wild animals come to drink, creating a unique ecosystem within the property.

nursery.title: Native Plant Nursery
nursery.description: A small nursery with native tree seedlings, part of our ongoing effort to preserve and enhance the local ecosystem.

fenced.title: Fenced Property
fenced.description: The entire area is fenced for your security and privacy.

caretaker.title: On-Site Caretaker
caretaker.description: The caretaker lives nearby for immediate assistance if needed.

aerialMap.shape: Almost the perfect square shape of 300x300 m.

shelter.title: The Shelter
shelter.subtitle: A self-sufficient refuge designed for disconnection and recharging.

solarPowered.title: Solar Powered
solarPowered.description: Fully self-sufficient with solar panels providing all the electricity you need.

insulated.title: Well Insulated
insulated.description: Stays cool in summer and warm in winter with natural insulation.

solarSystem.title: Solar Power System
solarSystem.description: Equipped with solar panels providing lights and standard 220V outlets for all your devices.

hotShower.title: Hot Shower
hotShower.description: Private bathroom with hot shower for comfortable hygiene routines.

kitchen.title: Full Kitchen
kitchen.description: Stove, fridge, and complete cookware: plates, cutlery, glasses, pots, pans, kettle, and all cooking utensils.

amenities.title: Welcome Amenities
amenities.description: Complimentary welcome tea and sweets to start your retreat experience.

climate.title: Climate Control
climate.description: Well-insulated with gas heating, suitable for cold climates and comfortable year-round.

sleeping.title: Comfortable Sleeping
sleeping.description: Quality mattress and bedding for restful nights after days in nature.

notIncluded.title: What's Not Included
notIncluded.noWifi: No WiFi - We present this as a place to disconnect. However, there is good mobile internet reception from all carriers for when you need it.
notIncluded.linens: Bring your own sheets and towels - We recommend bringing your own linens for comfort.
notIncluded.electricity: Limited electricity - Solar power is sufficient for lights and charging devices, but not for high-consumption appliances.

footer.description:
Private autonomous shelter in the dunes.
Disconnect. Recharge. Return.
